segments.text: Could you tell me if you have ever taken a class from Dr . Miller ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Are you going to be taking a class from him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I have never taken his class before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is very interesting and challenging . Is that what you are looking for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He is really clear on what you need to learn to get a good grade . Are you willing to study hard ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What I really liked about him is that he was an understanding and friendly teacher . Do you enjoy that in a teacher ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I had a teacher like that before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you know that he has 20 years teaching experience ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn't , but that could be a good thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , take a look at everything and figure out what is best for you . Good luck !
segments.speaker: S2
